verses.verse: Now the Philistines <S%H6430><s%> took <S%H3947><s%> the ark <S%H727><s%> of God <S%H430><s%> and brought <S%H935><s%> it from Ebenezer <S%H72><s%> to Ashdod. <S%H795><s%>

Then the Philistines <S%H6430><s%> took <S%H3947><s%> the ark <S%H727><s%> of God <S%H430><s%> and brought <S%H935><s%> it to the house <S%H1004><s%> of Dagon, <S%H1712><s%> and set <S%H3322><s%> it by Dagon. <S%H1712><s%>

When the Ashdodites <S%H796><s%> arose <S%H7925><s%> early <S%H7925><s%> the next <S%H4283><s%> morning, <S%H4283><s%> behold, <S%H2009><s%> Dagon <S%H1712><s%> had fallen <S%H5307><s%> on his face <S%H6440><s%> to the ground <S%H776><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> the ark <S%H727><s%> of the Lord. <S%H3068><s%> So they took <S%H3947><s%> Dagon <S%H1712><s%> and set <S%H7725><s%> him in his place <S%H4725><s%> again. <S%H7725><s%>

But when they arose <S%H7925><s%> early <S%H7925><s%> the next <S%H4283><s%> morning, <S%H1242><s%> behold, <S%H2009><s%> Dagon <S%H1712><s%> had fallen <S%H5307><s%> on his face <S%H6440><s%> to the ground <S%H776><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> the ark <S%H727><s%> of the Lord. <S%H3068><s%> And the head <S%H7218><s%> of Dagon <S%H1712><s%> and both <S%H8147><s%> the palms <S%H3709><s%> of his hands <S%H3027><s%> [were] cut <S%H3772><s%> off <S%H3772><s%> on the threshold; <S%H4670><s%> only <S%H7534><s%> the trunk of Dagon <S%H1712><s%> was left <S%H7604><s%> to him.

Therefore <S%H5921><s%> <S%H3651><s%> neither <S%H3808><s%> the priests <S%H3548><s%> of Dagon <S%H1712><s%> nor <S%H3808><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> who enter <S%H935><s%> Dagon <S%H1712><s%>'s house <S%H1004><s%> tread <S%H1869><s%> on the threshold <S%H4670><s%> of Dagon in Ashdod <S%H795><s%> to this <S%H2088><s%> day. <S%H3117><s%>

Now the hand <S%H3027><s%> of the Lord <S%H3068><s%> was heavy <S%H3513><s%> on the Ashdodites, <S%H796><s%> and He ravaged <S%H8074><s%> them and smote <S%H5221><s%> them with tumors, <S%H9425><s%> both Ashdod <S%H795><s%> and its territories. <S%H1366><s%>

When the men <S%H376><s%> of Ashdod <S%H795><s%> saw <S%H7200><s%> that it was so, <S%H3651><s%> they said, <S%H559><s%> "The ark <S%H727><s%> of the God <S%H430><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> must not remain <S%H3427><s%> with us, for His hand <S%H3027><s%> is severe <S%H7185><s%> on us and on Dagon <S%H1712><s%> our god. <S%H430><s%>"

So they sent <S%H7971><s%> and gathered <S%H622><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> the lords <S%H5633><s%> of the Philistines <S%H6430><s%> to them and said, <S%H559><s%> "What <S%H4100><s%> shall we do <S%H6213><s%> with the ark <S%H727><s%> of the God <S%H430><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%>?" And they said, <S%H559><s%> "Let the ark <S%H727><s%> of the God <S%H430><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> be brought <S%H5437><s%> around <S%H5437><s%> to Gath. <S%H1661><s%>" And they brought <S%H5437><s%> the ark <S%H727><s%> of the God <S%H430><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> [around.]

And it came <S%H1961><s%> about that after <S%H310><s%> they had brought <S%H5437><s%> it around, <S%H5437><s%> the hand <S%H3027><s%> of the Lord <S%H3068><s%> was against the city <S%H5892><s%> with very <S%H3966><s%> great <S%H1419><s%> confusion; <S%H4103><s%> and He smote <S%H5221><s%> the men <S%H376><s%> of the city, <S%H5892><s%> both <S%H4480><s%> young <S%H9512><s%> and old, <S%H1419><s%> so that tumors <S%H9425><s%> broke <S%H8368><s%> out on them.

So they sent <S%H7971><s%> the ark <S%H727><s%> of God <S%H430><s%> to Ekron. <S%H6138><s%> And it happened <S%H1961><s%> as the ark <S%H727><s%> of God <S%H430><s%> came <S%H935><s%> to Ekron <S%H6138><s%> that the Ekronites <S%H6139><s%> cried <S%H2199><s%> out, saying, <S%H559><s%> "They have brought <S%H5437><s%> the ark <S%H727><s%> of the God <S%H430><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> around <S%H5437><s%> to us, to kill <S%H4191><s%> us and our people. <S%H5971><s%>"

They sent <S%H7971><s%> therefore and gathered <S%H622><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> the lords <S%H5633><s%> of the Philistines <S%H6430><s%> and said, <S%H559><s%> "Send <S%H7971><s%> away <S%H7971><s%> the ark <S%H727><s%> of the God <S%H430><s%> of Israel, <S%H3478><s%> and let it return <S%H7725><s%> to its own place, <S%H4725><s%> that it may not kill <S%H4191><s%> us and our people. <S%H5971><s%>" For there was a deadly <S%H4194><s%> confusion <S%H4103><s%> throughout <S%H3605><s%> the city; <S%H5892><s%> the hand <S%H3027><s%> of God <S%H430><s%> was very <S%H3966><s%> heavy <S%H3513><s%> there. <S%H8033><s%>

And the men <S%H376><s%> who <S%H834><s%> did not die <S%H4191><s%> were smitten <S%H5221><s%> with tumors <S%H9425><s%> and the cry <S%H7775><s%> of the city <S%H5892><s%> went <S%H5927><s%> up to heaven. <S%H8064><s%>
